Package com.facetec.sdk

Class FaceTecFeedbackCustomization

java.lang.Object
com.facetec.sdk.FaceTecFeedbackCustomization
public final class FaceTecFeedbackCustomization extends Object
Customize the Feedback Bar.

    enablePulsatingText
    Control whether to enable the pulsating-text animation within the Feedback Bar.

    android.graphics.Typeface
    textFont
    Font of the text displayed within the Feedback Bar.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.

  • Field Details

    • cornerRadius

      public int cornerRadius
      Corner radius of the Feedback Bar.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

    • backgroundColors

      public int backgroundColors
      Color of the Feedback Bar's background. Recommend making this have some transparency.
      This accepts a color or drawable resource id.
      Default is custom FaceTec color.

    • textColor

      public int textColor
      Color of the text displayed within the Feedback Bar.
      Default is white.

    • textFont

      public android.graphics.Typeface textFont
      Font of the text displayed within the Feedback Bar.
      If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used. Default is null.

    • enablePulsatingText

      public boolean enablePulsatingText
      Control whether to enable the pulsating-text animation within the Feedback Bar.
      Default is true (enabled).

    • elevation

      public int elevation
      Elevation of the Feedback Bar from the Frame background.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.
